description: The CityGear Netbook Case is designed to fit netbooks with up to 10.2" screens.  The zip-down workstation features pen loops, a cell phone/PDA pouch and mesh accessory pocket.  The case provides plenty of space to store a power adapter and other accessories and includes a back slip pocket for additional items.  For added convenience, the CityGear Netbook case features a carry handle and a padded/adjustable shoulder strap, making it comfortable and equipped for travel.
title: Targus CityGear Netbook Case for up to 10.2 Inch Netbooks- Black and Grey TSM097US
